TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginName extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

span.span: Displays the value of the property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [简介Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 简介Introduction 默认情况下， 控件显示类的属性中包含的名称 。By default, the control displays the name contained in the property of the class. 如果该 `System.Web.UI.Page.User.Identity.Name` 属性为空，则不会呈现控件。If the `System.Web.UI.Page.User.Identity.Name` property is empty, the control is not rendered. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 中提供的登录控件集，请参阅 [ASP.NET Login Controls 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178329(v=vs.100)) ，然后继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178329(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅 [使用成员身份管理用户](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100))。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/tw292whz(v=vs.100)). 若要更改控件显示的文本 ，请设置 属性。To change the text displayed by the control, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 控件不能在网页的标记之外使用 `
` 。The control cannot be used outside the `` tag on a Web page. 具体来说， 不能用于将用户的名称放在页的标题中。Specifically, the cannot be used to put the user's name in the title of a page. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在页上使用类。The following code example shows how to use the class on a page. 单击该按钮将更改显示格式。Clicking the button changes the display format. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/CS/loginnametextformatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/VB/loginnametextformatvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Login Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string FormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string FormatString
Public Overridable Property FormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ FormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 提供要显示的格式项字符串。

span.span: Provides a format item string to display.

value.span: 包含用于显示用户名的格式项的字符串。

span.span: A string containing format items for displaying the user's name.
The default value is "{0}".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在网页上显示用户的名称的标准文本格式字符串。The property contains a standard text format string that displays the user's name on the Web page. 字符串 " {0} " 指示插入到字符串中用户名称的位置。The string "{0}" indicates where in the string the user's name is inserted. 下表描述了可用的属性设置。The following table describes the available property settings. |属性设置Property setting|行为Behavior| |----------------------|--------------| |默认 ( " {0} " ) Default ("{0}")|用户登录时显示用户的名称;否则，不会显示任何内容。The user's name is displayed when the user is logged on; otherwise, nothing is displayed.| ||与默认值相同。Same as default. 若要隐藏控件，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To hide the control, set the property to `false`.| |"欢迎使用我的网站， {0} "。"Welcome to my site, {0}."|显示 "欢迎使用我的网站， *用户名*" 字符串。Displays the string "Welcome to my site, *username*." 当用户登录时。when the user is logged in. 如果用户未登录，则不会显示任何内容。When the user is not logged in, nothing is displayed.| |"欢迎使用我的网站"。"Welcome to my site."|如果将 属性设置为字符串，则当用户登录时，将显示该字符串。When the property is set to a string, the string is displayed when the user is logged in. 由于字符串不包含 " {0} "，因此不会显示用户的名称。Because the string does not contain "{0}", the user's name is not displayed. 如果用户未登录，则不会显示任何内容。When the user is not logged in, nothing is displayed.| 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在页上使用属性。The following code example shows how to use the property on a page. 单击该按钮将更改显示格式。Clicking the button changes the display format. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/CS/loginnametextformatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/VB/loginnametextformatvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The format string is not valid.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于 4.0，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .
